message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.NA, cs.DS, cs.SY 

This paper deals with optimization algorithms for machine learning, specifically focusing on the geometry of continuous-time mirror descent updates. The paper also introduces a new family of reparameterizations that interpolate between two commonly used updates, which is relevant to the field of optimization in machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.IT (Information Theory) and cs.NA (Numerical Analysis). The paper also involves mathematical analysis and optimization, which could place it in cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.SY (Systems and Control), respectively.
